properties.description: Whether or not the splitter can be draggable
properties.name: allowDrag

properties.description: Whether or not the gutter can be collapsed
properties.name: collapsable

properties.description: Whether or not the gutter element is collapsed
properties.name: collapsed

properties.description: Window resolution is between desktop resolution range values
properties.name: desktop

properties.description: Whether or not the gutter element is loaded
properties.name: loaded

properties.description: CSS position property (dependes on gutter type)         Values: left, top         Default: left
properties.name: posProp

properties.description: Second section size value before being collapsed
properties.name: sectionBeforeCollapse

properties.description: Size property name (dependes on gutter type)         Values: offsetWidth, offsetHeight         Default: offsetWidth
properties.name: sizeProp

properties.description: Splitter position value before being collapsed
properties.name: splitterBeforeCollapse

properties.description: Gutter direction type         Values: horizontal, vertical         Default: horizontal
properties.name: type

methods.description: Resize listener for responsive purposes
methods.name: addGutterResizeListener

methods.description: Check device resolution and change the splitter size
methods.name: applyResponsive

methods.description: Change splitter style size property
methods.name: changeSplitterSize

methods.description: Check drag limits before start
methods.name: checkMoveConstraints

methods.description: Check drag limits before resize sections
methods.name: checkMoveConstraints

methods.description: Separator clickable zone click functionality
methods.name: clickCollapsable

methods.description: Collapse section
methods.name: collapseSection

methods.description: Create splitter and configure it
methods.name: createSeparator

methods.description: Mouse events listener needed for drag functionality
methods.name: drag

methods.description: Move splitter to a specified position
methods.name: moveSplitter

methods.description: Adapt gutter to smaller devices
methods.name: responsiveListener

methods.description: Reposition sections after a gutter resize
methods.name: sectionResize

methods.description: Collapsable functionality
methods.name: setCollapsable

methods.description: Resize gutters sections
methods.name: setSectionSize

methods.description: Apply gutter styling and user customizable behaviour
methods.name: setUpGutter

methods.description: Set a quick access to the gutter structure elements
methods.name: setUpQuickAccess

methods.description: Set sections styling
methods.name: setUpSection

methods.description: Reposition splitter after a gutter resize
methods.name: splitterResize

methods.description: Convert global splitter positions value to percentage
methods.name: storeSplitterPercentage

methods.description: Add or remove animation styling for sections on collapse time
methods.name: toggleCollapseAnimation

params.description: Whether or not the animation should stop
params.name: stop

methods.description: Update gutter drag limits on gutter resize
methods.name: updateDragLimits
